sentence.text: Hypermethylated in cancer 1 (HIC1) is frequently deleted or epigenetically silenced in various human cancers.
In this study, we found that HIC1 acted as a tumor suppressor and that its expression was downregulated in UM.
The results provide evidence that lncRNA-numb is a newly proposed tumor suppressor that is involved in HIC1-induced phenotypes.

Taken together, our studies of UM reveal a critical role of HIC1 in the regulation of tumorigenesis, at least partly through its downstream target, lncRNA-numb, and provide a potential therapeutic target for UM
